author: Judith Prakash J:
casename: Parkway Hospitals Singapore Pte Ltd (trading as Mount Elizabeth Hospital) and Another v Sandar Aung
counsel: Lek Siang Pheng and Mar Seow Hwei (Rodyk & Davidson) for the plaintiffs; James Leslie Ponniah and Leong Sue Lynn (Wong & Lim) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Contract/Assignment/Capacity/Whether assignee can sue debtor in own name where notice of such assignment not given to debtor

Contract/Contractual terms/Rules of construction/Defendant contracting with hospital to pay all expenses incurred by defendant's mother's stay in hospital/Hospital furnishing defendant with estimate of bill/Final bill exceeding estimate greatly/Whether agreement including bill estimate such that defendant not liable to pay excess costs
